text:
[Verse]
Raindrops fall on my face
Feel the rhythm and the grace
Puddle splashes in the night
Underneath the city lights

[Verse 2]
Spinning circles on the street
Dancing with my happy feet
Umbrella thrown into the sky
Watch the clouds as they go by

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain tonight
Let the drops make it all right
Every step a new surprise
Feel the joy behind my eyes

[Bridge]
Hear the thunder far away
Lightning lights up the display
Nature’s beat starts to play
Won't let this magic fade away

[Verse 3]
Every splash a melody
In this rainy harmony
Laughing as the world spins round
Lost and found without a sound

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain tonight
Let the drops make it all right
Every step a new surprise
Feel the joy behind my eyes
title: Dancing in the Rain
